title: When's Borderlands 3 Getting Cross-Play? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.16.19
description:
Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Buy your Health + Ancestry Service kit today at http://23andme.com/GAMES

GameSpot's Jacob Dekker joins Greg to talk about Gearbox's thoughts on corss-play, Ubisoft's HitRecord response, and Pokemon!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:10 - Guest - Jacob Dekker (@jacobdekk)
00:04:14 - Housekeeping
The LEGO Podcast studio needs your help! Kbabz made the KF set in LEGO, and if we get 10,000 votes, it might become a reality: kindafunny.com/lego
I’m hosting the Hall H Marvel Games at SDCC Thursday @ 1:30 pm
Greg’s getting his 100th Plat Monday, July 22 @ 4 pm on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:05:34 - Borderlands 3 Cross Play?
00:14:26 - Watch Dogs Response from Ubi
00:22:28 - GameStop Redesigning Stores to Fight Back
00:31:26 - Kinect’s are still being used… as airport surveillance
00:33:09 - Out today
00:36:31 -  Quip
00:37:52 - 23 & Me
Reader mail   -
00:39:59 - “The mainline Pokemon games have had a method to continuously transfer Pokemon from a previous generation…” - Moto
00:40:41 - “Greg and Trisha discussed the issue surrounding the fact that not all Pokemon will be available in the new switch releases at the end of the year…” - Daniel Ferraro
00:45:42 - “How does reviewing games fit into your schedules?” - 2038 Pokemon CEO
00:50:06 - “How do you choose your part timers?” - BJ Bernardo
00:53:35 - Squad Up: Andrew - HP Wizards Unite - 319158821477
00:57:33 - Required Reading - https://bit.ly/2XIYau5
01:00:59 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
